column4: I backed up my home dir and 'am now reinstalling Ubuntu, is it possible to copy back the dir's for Evolution and restore my email?
if you have the backups sure
thanks! Would I setup the email accounts 1st or just copy back in the dirs and start Evolution?
in my view if you just copy it back it should work when you start it
thanks will give that a shot
the file is recreated once firefox is opened
